passwordError1: Password length must be between 8 and 16 characters
passwordError2: The password must include at least three types of the following: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters
passwordError3: The password cannot contain three or more consecutive digits or letters on the keyboard
passwordError4: The password must not include the full username string, variations in case, or similar transformations
notSame: The two entered passwords do not match
